name: DragDog
description:
Drag your hologram dog through a series of brain-melting, finger-breaking 2D physics puzzle platformer levels.

Made by tickMark

Controls
A-D / Left-Right: Run
Space / W / Up: Jump
R: Restart

(Hit two of the jump buttons in quick succession for super jump, all three of them for a super duper jump. These are definetly intended and not bugs. You can complete the whole game without them though. They are just for speedrun routes.)
